home.title: Welcome to IEEE Student Icesi
home.subtitle: Advancing Technology for Humanity
home.description: Join us in our mission to foster technological innovation and excellence for the benefit of humanity.

about.title: About Us
about.description: The IEEE Student Branch is a community of future engineers and technology enthusiasts dedicated to professional growth and technological advancement.
about.missionText: To be at the forefront of technological innovation and provide opportunities for students to develop their professional and technical abilities.
about.visionText: To be recognized as a leading IEEE Student Branch, fostering innovation and professional development in technology and engineering.
about.collaborationText: Working together to achieve greater technological advancements and innovations.
about.excellenceText: Striving for the highest standards in everything we do.

members.title: Our Members
members.description: Meet our dedicated team of students and faculty advisors working together to advance technology and knowledge.
members.committeesDescription: Specialized groups working on different aspects of our organization

innovation.name: Innovation and Projects Committee
innovation.description: Responsible for fostering creativity, developing technological projects, and organizing technical workshops.

external.name: External Relations Committee
external.description: Manages partnerships, collaborations, and communication with entities outside the university.

finance.name: Finance and Sponsorships Committee
finance.description: Manages financial resources, seeks sponsors, and supports the branch's economic sustainability.

wellness.name: Human Management, Culture, and Wellness Committee
wellness.description: Promotes well-being, integration, and personal development of members through cultural and social activities.

public.name: Public Relations Committee
public.description: Responsible for communication, event promotion, and social media management to strengthen the branch's image.

gallery.title: Photo Gallery
gallery.description: Explore our activities and events through our photo collection.

industry.title: Industry Visit
industry.description: Learning from professionals in the field

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.description: Stay updated with our latest events and activities.

workshop.title: Technical Workshop: AI and Machine Learning
workshop.description: Learn about the latest developments in AI and Machine Learning with hands-on exercises.

conference.title: IEEE Student Leadership Conference
conference.description: Annual leadership conference featuring keynote speakers and networking opportunities.

competition.title: Robotics Competition
competition.description: Showcase your robotics projects and compete with other teams.
